<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Check User's Saved Shows"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/me/shows/contains"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Check if one or more shows is already saved in the current Spotify user's library.

**Note:** Authorization scopes- **user-library-read**

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ids","description":"A comma-separated list of the Spotify IDs for the shows. **Maximum:** 50 IDs.","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","example":"2l8TIx8PeYYHVksDDPyuSA,5oSNPcnWLTSMSgiHRh3uut"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
